Welcome to the Classroom Allotment System!
This is the site where teacher and student interect directly to each other for classroom allotment, timetable Managment, class-statics, course meterial and other expacted works. For teachers we add some feature where teacher can generate there daily or weekly based timetable with there time. Also teachers can upload there course related Notes, Lecture Videos which is eassly available for students. In there we also add class-statics feature for teacher where teacher can see there weekly and monthly class data or how many total class will held weekly or monthly based.
For students they can see generated timetable which generated by the teachers daily or weekly based. Students can also get there course meterial on NOTES section where they get data upload by the teacher related to course notes, lecture videos etc. Student can also know how many subjects classes will held or will be happening in this week or month.

HTML Pages Overview with Screenshots

Teacher

dashboardt.html

Overview

This is the Teacher Dashboard page where teachers can manage their classes, view reports, and access their timetable. It provides an interface to monitor class schedules, student attendance, and performance metrics.

Features include class management, timetable viewing, and report generation.

Course-Meterials.html

Overview

This page allows teachers to upload and share course materials such as notes, lecture videos, and other resources with students. It supports file uploads and categorization of materials by subject or class.

Teachers can manage their uploaded content and track student access.

report.html

Overview

This page displays various reports related to classes and student performance. Teachers can view attendance reports, grade summaries, and other analytics to assess class progress.

Reports can be filtered by date, class, or subject.

stats.html

Overview

This statistics page provides visual data representations related to classes and teacher activities. It includes charts and graphs for attendance, performance, and timetable adherence.

Helps teachers analyze trends and make informed decisions.

timetable-final-updated.html

Overview

This page shows the final updated timetable for teachers, reflecting any changes or adjustments made. It provides a clear schedule for daily and weekly classes.

Includes options to print or export the timetable.

timetable-generator.html

Overview

This page allows teachers to generate timetables based on class availability, subjects, and teacher schedules. It automates the creation of daily and weekly timetables.

Includes customization options and conflict resolution features.
